content: bulky pumpkin isn t just a project it s a celebration of fall wrapped in yarn with every stitch you summon the spirit of crisp leaves cider-scented breezes and pumpkin patch dreams it s a swift and satisfying knit with a shape so charming it might just wink at you from the mantel pick colors that make your heart dance and let this plump little pumpkin turn any room into a storybook scene
